title: Patient Experience Research for New Telehealth Platform
description: HealthTech Solutions is developing a telehealth platform for chronic disease management. We want to understand patient experiences with existing telehealth solutions and get feedback on our platform concept. The research will help us refine our product before beta testing.
objectives: Understand current patient satisfaction with telehealth services
Identify barriers to telehealth adoption among chronic disease patients
Get feedback on our platform concept and key features
Understand what would make patients switch from current solutions

requirements.target_audience: Patients with chronic conditions (diabetes, hypertension, COPD) who have used telehealth in past 12 months

timeline: Need results by end of Q3
target_audience: Chronic disease patients with telehealth experience
